function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Exchange of information in online crisis groups could lead to the spread of misinformation and incorrect advice regarding disease management.","category":"Potential Misinformation and False Data","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on twitter data may compromise privacy and consent of individuals sharing their thoughts on loneliness during the pandemic.","category":"Privacy risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive coverage of all affected countries in the literature review","category":"Inaccurate or Incomplete Data","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Withdrawn scientific papers causing confusion","category":"Reliability and Quality of Data","confidence":"Low"}]}
